snippet: The man who held a five-year-old boy in a bunker for days was killed during a rescue operation by federal agents.
abstract: Six-day Alabama standoff between Jimmy Lee Dykes, angry and violent survivalist who held 5-year-old boy hostage in underground bunker, and legion of local, state and federal law enforcement officials ends with death of kidnapper and freeing of boy; Dykes killed school bus driver when he abducted boy in Midland City.

byline.original: By ROBBIE BROWN and CAMPBELL ROBERTSON

lead_paragraph: The man who held a five-year-old boy in a bunker for days was killed during a rescue operation by federal agents.

headline.seo: Boy Is Safe After Alabama Hostage Standoff
headline.main: Standoff in Alabama Ends in Boy’s Rescue and Kidnapper’s Death
headline.print_headline: Standoff in Alabama Ends in Boy’s Rescue and Kidnapper’s Death
